content: Mahanth Gowda: Penn State Mahanth Gowda Home Papers Teaching News CV Join Us Contact W314, Westgate Building 814-863-0608 mahanth.gowda@psu.edu Google Scholar Profile I am an Associate Professor in the school of EECS at Pennsylvania State University. I am looking for strongly-motivated PhD students. My areas of interest include Wireless Networking, Mobile and Wearable Computing, Machine Learning with applications to Cyber Physical Systems, IoT and human behavioral sensing.
